headline: The Bull Case For Constellation Energy (CEG) Could Change Following Its AI Data Center Nuclear Contracts – Learn Why
summary: In recent months, Constellation Energy has drawn increased attention as the largest US nuclear operator supplying carbon-free power to AI data centers under long-term contracts, reinforcing its role in grid reliability and rising baseload demand. This spotlight on nuclear’s revival underscores how Constellation’s high-margin generation fleet and emissions-free profile are becoming central to meeting power-hungry digital infrastructure needs. We’ll now examine how Constellation’s growing role...
